name: The Journey Home (itch) (mantak)
description:
Jack is a successful but bitter man who has been estranged from his family for many years. He hasn‘t been in contact with them for more than 10 years. He still holds grudge and resents his parents for what happened during his childhood. However, during his work he suddenly has a daydream where he lands in a place full of memories, it symbolizes the necessity to go back to his roots and find out the reasoning behind his parents’ actions so he would be finally able to forgive.

Redfox Cloud ©
